com.revo.deployr.client.broker

Class RBrokerStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.revo.deployr.client.broker.RBrokerStatus

  • public class RBrokerStatus
extends java.lang.Object
    RBroker status indicating number of currently queued and executing RTask.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int executingTasks
      Number of RTask currently executing on RBroker.
      boolean isIdle
      Flag indicating if RBroker is idle.
      int pendingTasks
      Number of RTask currently on RBroker queues pending execution.

    • Field Detail

      • pendingTasks

        public final int pendingTasks
        Number of RTask currently on RBroker queues pending execution.

      • executingTasks

        public final int executingTasks
        Number of RTask currently executing on RBroker.

      • isIdle

        public final boolean isIdle
        Flag indicating if RBroker is idle. Idle indicates there are currently no pending or executing RTask. An idle RBroker can be safely shutdown.
